name: LumberJack (PolyRetro)
description:
Why?

This game was created with nothing special in mind, just a small scale project, nothing more.

How to Play

This game is nothing to laugh at, it will test your mental strength. Please be very careful when playing this game.

The controls are simple, you just click. You don't even have to time your clicks, you can spam the click button as much as you want.

Enjoy, and don't go in too deep.
